plot:
After getting fired from his current job as a pilot and dumped by his 
current wife, he seeks to find a new job. Out of desperation on the job 
market he disguises himself as a woman in order to get a job from 
Silver, a company seeking a female pilot. The lines between his female 
and male life as well as his personal and love life starts to become a 
blur which he eventually cannot handle.              Fuente: IMDb
title: Cockpit
